modName: Wisp Mother HD Retexture - Quartz Atronach
summary:
An HD texture replacer made from scratch for the Wisp Mother and also allows you to summon her under the name of Quartz Atronach with custom features. With the use of Parallax shading, it was possible to achieve a diamond-like appeareance.
Optional files coming soon.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/wispy_title_001.png[/img]

[center][youtube]Gnl4iejIZ3o&hd=1[/youtube][/center][right][url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC575SRgFG-lWvJ-KNBIjYHg/videos][img]http://imgur.com/5H2j1bF.png[/img][/url][/right]

[img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/wispy_overview.png[/img]

Replacement textures made from scratch and models for the Wisp Mother, giving her a diamond-like body which is highly reflective and varies a lot depending on the lightning in the enviroment.

This mod also implements this custom model as a Summonable creature, more specifically an Atronach; it's fully compatible with the 'Elemental Potency' perk for conjurable Potent versions.

[img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/wispy_quartz.png[/img]
The new atronach is an Adept spell. She looks exactly like the retextured Wisp Mother HD except her smokey aura is visibly smaller compared to hers and the color has changed to white. Also, the looping 'tingling' sound when idle has been lowered as to not annoy the player as she would be practically a follower.
All this has been achieved by making a separate race, and separate npcs.

[size=5][b]Spells[/b][/size]

[b]Quartz Atronach & Potent[/b]

Ice Volley: Launches Ice spikes at enemies.
Diamond Flakes: A stream of crystaline flakes that slows down enemies movement by 70%.

[b]Quartz Thrall & Potent[/b]

Ice Volley: As above
Diamond Shards: Slows down enemies movement by 80%.

The Atronach version doesn't split into 3 shades anymore to make it more balanced.

[img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/wispy_location.png[/img]

Both tomes can be found in the Halls of Attainment, upstairs by the round table next to a stack of books.

[img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/wispy_compatibility.png[/img]

Should work with any mod except the ones that edit the Wisp Mother, although the Quartz Atronach should work nevertheless.


[size=5][b]Screenshots Taken with[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37716/?]Somber ENB by Tansarville - Creator and Maeldun0 - Manager[/url]
[url=http://www.enbdev.com/] ENBseries by Boris Vorontsov [/url]

[img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/button_title_001.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50327/?][img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/button_shrineschibi.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51456/?][img]http://zonelessdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/button_flame-atro.png[/img][/url]
